headline.main: Foe Strikes Back at Allied Raiders Over Italy but Fails to Stop Them; FOE STRIKES BACK AT ITALY RAIDERS

lead_paragraph: ALLIED HEADQUARTERS IN NORTH AFRICA, Aug. 31 -- Goaded by the daily pounding administered by Allied bombers to railroad centers throughout central Italy, the German Air Force struck back yesterday by sending about seventy-five Messerschmitt 109's into the air when Allied medium bombers roared in over Aversa, north of Naples.
abstract: Ger Air Force strikes back at Allied raiders
